title: My first project
content: At the beginning of the 2nd episode  we see Annie who is chatting with somebody. After a while Bridget came in and girls begin to wake the Hector. When he got out of bed, Bridget laugh at his pajamas. A little later Nick walked into the room and had small talk with Hector. Nick told him his appearance is not very good and if he want to be liked by girls Nick could help with it.
